## Exercice 1

``` {r figure}
library(ggplot2)
library(data.table)

a <- c(1, 2, 30:45)
b <- seq_along(a)
d <- a * b
e <- data.frame(x_val = a, y_val = d)

saveRDS(e, "data/data.rds")
ggplot(e, aes(x=x_val, y=y_val)) + geom_point(colour = 'purple')

```
